component.description: The component of the application (e.g., frontend, backend, database)

partOf.description: The larger system that this application is part of (e.g., CTA)

oneOf.description: Library configuration provided as a string (via --set-file).

name.description: The name of the library (e.g., VLSTK10)

device.description: The device associated with the library (e.g., sg0)

drivenames.description: A list of drive names (e.g., VDSTK01, VDSTK02)

drivedevices.description: A list of drive device names (e.g., nst2, nst0)

tapes.description: A list of tapes (e.g., V00101, V00102)

library.description: Library configuration containing type, name, device, drive names, drive devices, and tapes.
